name: St Joseph's Health Centre Guelph - Acquired Brain Injury Day Program
comment:
Adult day program * social, recreational, and therapeutic activities for people with acquired brain injury in a group setting for part of the day * helps to support family caregivers who provide day-to-day care
  • meals

Access to social work support including:
  • peer support groups
  • caregiver support groups
  • individual counseling
serviceProvisionCode: $5 per day * subsidy available for eligible participants
